file_content.text: I demand to have a spot on the ark. My family has been here for generations!
More like resting on your laurels for generations. Sir, I'm willing to spend whatever it takes to secure a compartment for my family.
Please, calm yourselves. Both of your families are safe. The ark has room for everybody left on Makeb.
That's a lie. Everybody knows Makeb is overpopulated!
He may be pompous, but he's no fool. There can't be enough room to fit an entire planet's worth of people.
If we have to, we can fit one-and-a-half Makebs into the ark. Take a look at these schematics. There's enough room.
